Template.name: sap.makit.Axis
Template.jsTemplate: new sap.makit.Axis({ id: "${id}", // sap.ui.core.ID showLabel: true, // boolean showPrimaryLine: true, // boolean showGrid: false, // boolean thickness: 1, // float color: "gray", // string tooltip: undefined, // sap.ui.core.TooltipBase customData: [], // sap.ui.core.CustomData dependents: [] // sap.ui.core.Element, since 1.19 })
Template.xmlTemplate: <Axis xmlns="sap.makit" id="${id}" showLabel="true" showPrimaryLine="true" showGrid="false" thickness="1" color="gray"> <tooltip></tooltip> <!-- sap.ui.core.TooltipBase --> <dependents></dependents> <!-- sap.ui.core.Element, since 1.19 --> </Axis>

Template.name: sap.makit.Category
Template.jsTemplate: new sap.makit.Category({ id: "${id}", // sap.ui.core.ID column: undefined, // string displayName: undefined, // string format: undefined, // string tooltip: undefined, // sap.ui.core.TooltipBase customData: [], // sap.ui.core.CustomData dependents: [] // sap.ui.core.Element, since 1.19 })
Template.xmlTemplate: <Category xmlns="sap.makit" id="${id}" column="" displayName="" format=""> <tooltip></tooltip> <!-- sap.ui.core.TooltipBase --> <dependents></dependents> <!-- sap.ui.core.Element, since 1.19 --> </Category>

Template.name: sap.makit.CategoryAxis
Template.jsTemplate: new sap.makit.CategoryAxis({ id: "${id}", // sap.ui.core.ID showLabel: true, // boolean showPrimaryLine: true, // boolean showGrid: false, // boolean thickness: 1, // float color: "gray", // string sortOrder: sap.makit.SortOrder.None, // sap.makit.SortOrder displayLastLabel: false, // boolean displayAll: true, // boolean tooltip: undefined, // sap.ui.core.TooltipBase customData: [], // sap.ui.core.CustomData dependents: [] // sap.ui.core.Element, since 1.19 })
Template.xmlTemplate: <CategoryAxis xmlns="sap.makit" id="${id}" showLabel="true" showPrimaryLine="true" showGrid="false" thickness="1" color="gray" sortOrder="None" displayLastLabel="false" displayAll="true"> <tooltip></tooltip> <!-- sap.ui.core.TooltipBase --> <dependents></dependents> <!-- sap.ui.core.Element, since 1.19 --> </CategoryAxis>

Template.name: sap.makit.Chart
Template.xmlTemplate: <Chart xmlns="sap.makit" id="${id}" busy="false" busyIndicatorDelay="1000" visible="true" fieldGroupIds="" width="100%" height="100%" type="Column" showRangeSelector="true" showTableView="false" legendPosition="" lineThickness="1" showTableValue="true" maxSliceCount="12" primaryColorPalette="" showTotalValue="false" numberOfVisibleCategories="" rangeSelectorStartPosition="0" validateFieldGroup="" doubletap="" tap="" longpress=""> <tooltip></tooltip> <!-- sap.ui.core.TooltipBase --> <dependents></dependents> <!-- sap.ui.core.Element, since 1.19 --> <rows></rows> <!-- sap.makit.Row --> <columns></columns> <!-- sap.makit.Column --> <series></series> <!-- sap.makit.Series --> <values></values> <!-- sap.makit.Value --> <categoryRegions></categoryRegions> <!-- sap.makit.Category --> <category></category> <!-- sap.makit.Category --> <categoryAxis></categoryAxis> <!-- sap.makit.CategoryAxis --> <valueAxis></valueAxis> <!-- sap.makit.ValueAxis --> <valueBubble></valueBubble> <!-- sap.makit.ValueBubble --> </Chart>

Template.name: sap.makit.Column
Template.jsTemplate: new sap.makit.Column({ id: "${id}", // sap.ui.core.ID name: undefined, // string value: undefined, // any type: "string", // string tooltip: undefined, // sap.ui.core.TooltipBase customData: [], // sap.ui.core.CustomData dependents: [] // sap.ui.core.Element, since 1.19 })
Template.xmlTemplate: <Column xmlns="sap.makit" id="${id}" name="" value="" type="string"> <tooltip></tooltip> <!-- sap.ui.core.TooltipBase --> <dependents></dependents> <!-- sap.ui.core.Element, since 1.19 --> </Column>

Template.name: sap.makit.CombinationChart
Template.xmlTemplate: <CombinationChart xmlns="sap.makit" id="${id}" busy="false" busyIndicatorDelay="1000" visible="true" fieldGroupIds="" width="100%" height="100%" showRangeSelector="true" legendPosition="Left" primaryColorPalette="" secondaryColorPalette="" showTableValue="true" numberOfVisibleCategories="" rangeSelectorStartPosition="0" validateFieldGroup="" doubletap="" tap="" longpress=""> <tooltip></tooltip> <!-- sap.ui.core.TooltipBase --> <dependents></dependents> <!-- sap.ui.core.Element, since 1.19 --> <categoryRegions></categoryRegions> <!-- sap.makit.Category --> <layers></layers> <!-- sap.makit.Layer --> <categoryAxis></categoryAxis> <!-- sap.makit.CategoryAxis --> <primaryValueAxis></primaryValueAxis> <!-- sap.makit.ValueAxis --> <secondaryValueAxis></secondaryValueAxis> <!-- sap.makit.ValueAxis --> <valueBubble></valueBubble> <!-- sap.makit.ValueBubble --> </CombinationChart>

Template.name: sap.makit.Layer
Template.jsTemplate: new sap.makit.Layer({ id: "${id}", // sap.ui.core.ID type: sap.makit.ChartType.Column, // sap.makit.ChartType lineThickness: 1, // float primaryColorPalette: undefined, // any drawOnSecondaryAxis: false, // boolean tooltip: undefined, // sap.ui.core.TooltipBase customData: [], // sap.ui.core.CustomData dependents: [], // sap.ui.core.Element, since 1.19 rows: [], // sap.makit.Row columns: [], // sap.makit.Column series: undefined, // sap.makit.Series values: [] // sap.makit.Value })
Template.xmlTemplate: <Layer xmlns="sap.makit" id="${id}" type="Column" lineThickness="1" primaryColorPalette="" drawOnSecondaryAxis="false"> <tooltip></tooltip> <!-- sap.ui.core.TooltipBase --> <dependents></dependents> <!-- sap.ui.core.Element, since 1.19 --> <rows></rows> <!-- sap.makit.Row --> <columns></columns> <!-- sap.makit.Column --> <series></series> <!-- sap.makit.Series --> <values></values> <!-- sap.makit.Value --> </Layer>

Template.name: sap.makit.MakitLib
sap.makit.Row
Template.jsTemplate: new sap.makit.Row({ id: "${id}", // sap.ui.core.ID tooltip: undefined, // sap.ui.core.TooltipBase customData: [], // sap.ui.core.CustomData dependents: [], // sap.ui.core.Element, since 1.19 cells: [] // sap.makit.Column })

Template.name: sap.makit.Series
Template.jsTemplate: new sap.makit.Series({ id: "${id}", // sap.ui.core.ID column: undefined, // string displayName: undefined, // string format: undefined, // string tooltip: undefined, // sap.ui.core.TooltipBase customData: [], // sap.ui.core.CustomData dependents: [] // sap.ui.core.Element, since 1.19 })

Template.name: sap.makit.Value
Template.jsTemplate: new sap.makit.Value({ id: "${id}", // sap.ui.core.ID expression: undefined, // string displayName: undefined, // string format: undefined, // string locale: undefined, // string tooltip: undefined, // sap.ui.core.TooltipBase customData: [], // sap.ui.core.CustomData dependents: [] // sap.ui.core.Element, since 1.19 })

Template.name: sap.makit.ValueAxis
Template.jsTemplate: new sap.makit.ValueAxis({ id: "${id}", // sap.ui.core.ID showLabel: true, // boolean showPrimaryLine: true, // boolean showGrid: false, // boolean thickness: 1, // float color: "gray", // string min: undefined, // string max: undefined, // string tooltip: undefined, // sap.ui.core.TooltipBase customData: [], // sap.ui.core.CustomData dependents: [] // sap.ui.core.Element, since 1.19 })
Template.xmlTemplate: <ValueAxis xmlns="sap.makit" id="${id}" showLabel="true" showPrimaryLine="true" showGrid="false" thickness="1" color="gray" min="" max=""> <tooltip></tooltip> <!-- sap.ui.core.TooltipBase --> <dependents></dependents> <!-- sap.ui.core.Element, since 1.19 --> </ValueAxis>

Template.name: sap.makit.ValueBubble
Template.jsTemplate: new sap.makit.ValueBubble({ id: "${id}", // sap.ui.core.ID showCategoryText: true, // boolean showCategoryDisplayName: true, // boolean showValueDisplayName: true, // boolean showValueOnPieChart: false, // boolean showLegendLabel: true, // boolean showNullValue: true, // boolean position: sap.makit.ValueBubblePosition.Top, // sap.makit.ValueBubblePosition style: sap.makit.ValueBubbleStyle.Top, // sap.makit.ValueBubbleStyle visible: true, // boolean tooltip: undefined, // sap.ui.core.TooltipBase customData: [], // sap.ui.core.CustomData dependents: [] // sap.ui.core.Element, since 1.19 })
Template.xmlTemplate: <ValueBubble xmlns="sap.makit" id="${id}" showCategoryText="true" showCategoryDisplayName="true" showValueDisplayName="true" showValueOnPieChart="false" showLegendLabel="true" showNullValue="true" position="Top" style="Top" visible="true"> <tooltip></tooltip> <!-- sap.ui.core.TooltipBase --> <dependents></dependents> <!-- sap.ui.core.Element, since 1.19 --> </ValueBubble>
